job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on using AI as a tool to enhance existing software development processes and productivity, rather than building or fine-tuning AI models themselves. It lacks specific details on core AI engineering tasks like model development, MLOps, or deep generative AI applications.

phrases.phrase: elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.
phrases.justification: This phrase describes the goal of improving software solutions to achieve market leadership, user satisfaction, and a better overall experience, which aligns with understanding and contributing to business objectives.

phrases.phrase: elevating your coding skills to superhero status.
phrases.justification: This phrase, while metaphorical, implies using AI to significantly improve the output and capabilities of software development, which is a business-oriented goal of enhancing productivity and quality.

phrases.phrase: clarify complex concepts
phrases.justification: Using AI to simplify complex ideas suggests a focus on improving understanding and communication, which is a business-oriented application of AI.

phrases.phrase: boosting team efficiency.
phrases.justification: This directly relates to improving business operations and productivity through AI-driven summaries.

phrases.phrase: Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
phrases.justification: This sentence clearly outlines business objectives related to innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction that the AI integration aims to achieve.

phrases.phrase: AI-First Software Engineer
phrases.justification: The title itself indicates a role centered around software engineering with a primary focus on AI.

phrases.phrase: elevating your coding skills to superhero status.
phrases.justification: This implies the core activity of coding and developing software, enhanced by AI.

phrases.phrase: crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts
phrases.justification: This involves the development or configuration of tools, which falls under software development, even if the tools are AI-powered.

phrases.phrase: Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
phrases.justification: This describes the integration and implementation of AI within the software development lifecycle, including feature development.

phrases.phrase: Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks.
phrases.justification: This explicitly states the focus on coding and creating solutions, which are core software development activities.

phrases.phrase: tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot.
phrases.justification: This suggests a need for individuals who are eager to explore and adopt new technologies and approaches in software development.

phrases.phrase: employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level.
phrases.justification: This implies a continuous effort to learn and adapt to new technological advancements to improve skills.

phrases.phrase: driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons.
phrases.justification: Curiosity and readiness to explore new horizons are strong indicators of a desire to learn and adapt.

phrases.phrase: Are you up for the challenge?
phrases.justification: This question implies a dynamic environment where challenges are presented, requiring adaptability and a willingness to learn.

phrases.phrase: Think less routine, more innovation.
phrases.justification: This directly emphasizes the importance of innovation in the role.

phrases.phrase: pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development.
phrases.justification: This indicates a drive to innovate and go beyond current limitations.

phrases.phrase: creating innovative solutions
phrases.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the creation of innovative solutions as a key part of the role.

phrases.phrase: Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
phrases.justification: This highlights the expectation for the individual to take initiative and drive innovation within the development process.

phrases.phrase: predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge
phrases.justification: This describes a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues, which is a form of problem-solving.

phrases.phrase: problem-solving.
phrases.justification: This is a direct mention of problem-solving as a key aspect of the role.

phrases.phrase: identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
phrases.justification: This emphasizes efficient and effective resolution of problems, suggesting a pragmatic approach.
